title: fugue_expect - Pattern-Based Wait
description: High-level MCP tool that blocks until a regex pattern appears in pane output or timeout occurs. Supports configurable actions on match: notify, close_pane, or return_output. Uses polling-based implementation with 200ms interval. Foundation primitive for FEAT-094 and FEAT-095.
user_impact: Enables efficient waiting for specific output patterns without manual polling loops. Reduces context consumption by replacing read_pane polling cycles with single blocking call. Provides automatic actions on pattern match (close pane, return output).
